titleStmt.title: The famous conclave : wherein Clement VIII was elected Pope with the intrigues and cunning devices of that ecclesiastical assembly / faithfully translated out of an Italian manuscript found in one of the cardinals studies after his death.
titleStmt.author: Garencières, Theophilus, 1610-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.C. and A.C. for Samuel Lowndes ...,
